data-initial-value='{"active_tab":0,"error":"","input_text":"","is_streaming":false,"language":"text","output":"","placeholder":"Ask me anything...","tabs":[],"theme":"dark"}' data-label='null' data-js-url='"./@file/9107-4526665-pGjJQ0s5.js"' data-js-hash='"637436667b9ab7e1a16c8dabdd187a95"' data-css='"/**\n * Ontonaut StreamingWidget Styles\n * Simple input/output with streaming (like CodeEditor)\n */\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container {\n  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", Roboto, \"Helvetica Neue\", Arial, sans-serif;\n  border: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  border-radius: 6px;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  background: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);\n  margin: 8px 0;\n  transition: box-shadow 0.2s ease;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container:hover {\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  border-color: #333333;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n/* Toolbar */\n.ontonaut-stream-toolbar {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 8px;\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-toolbar {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-language {\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  padding: 2px 6px;\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n  border-radius: 3px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-language {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-run-button,\n.ontonaut-stream-clear-button {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 4px;\n  padding: 4px 10px;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  border: none;\n  border-radius: 4px;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: all 0.15s ease;\n  background: #10b981;\n  color: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-run-button:hover:not(.disabled) {\n  background: #059669;\n  transform: translateY(-0.5px);\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.25);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-run-button:active:not(.disabled) {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-run-button.disabled {\n  opacity: 0.5;\n  cursor: not-allowed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-clear-button {\n  background: white;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-clear-button {\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #f9fafb;\n  border-color: #d1d5db;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #2a2a2a;\n  border-color: #404040;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-clear-button:active {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-clear-button:active {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-run-button svg {\n  width: 12px;\n  height: 12px;\n}\n\n/* Input Section */\n.ontonaut-stream-input-section {\n  position: relative;\n  min-height: 80px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-input {\n  width: 100%;\n  padding: 12px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 13px;\n  line-height: 20px;\n  border: none;\n  outline: none;\n  resize: vertical;\n  min-height: 80px;\n  background: white;\n  color: #24292e;\n  tab-size: 4;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-input {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-input:focus {\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-input:focus {\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-input::placeholder {\n  color: #6a737d;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-input.disabled {\n  opacity: 0.6;\n  cursor: not-allowed;\n}\n\n/* Tabs Section */\n.ontonaut-stream-tabs {\n  display: flex;\n  gap: 2px;\n  padding: 8px 10px 0;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-top: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  overflow-x: auto;\n  overflow-y: hidden;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-tabs {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-top-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-tabs::-webkit-scrollbar {\n  height: 4px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-tabs::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {\n  background: #d1d5db;\n  border-radius: 2px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 6px;\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  border: none;\n  border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0;\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: all 0.15s ease;\n  white-space: nowrap;\n  max-width: 180px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab:hover {\n  background: #e5e7eb;\n  color: #374151;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab.active {\n  background: white;\n  color: #1f2937;\n  font-weight: 600;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-tab {\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-tab:hover {\n  background: #2a2a2a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-tab.active {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab-current {\n  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%);\n  color: white !important;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab-current:hover {\n  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #059669 0%, #047857 100%);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab-title {\n  overflow: hidden;\n  text-overflow: ellipsis;\n  white-space: nowrap;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab-close {\n  font-size: 16px;\n  line-height: 1;\n  opacity: 0.5;\n  transition: opacity 0.15s;\n  padding: 0 2px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-tab-close:hover {\n  opacity: 1;\n  color: #dc2626;\n}\n\n/* Output Section */\n.ontonaut-stream-output-section {\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output-section {\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-output-label {\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output-label {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-output {\n  margin: 0;\n  padding: 12px;\n  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", Roboto, \"Helvetica Neue\", Arial, sans-serif;\n  font-size: 13px;\n  line-height: 1.6;\n  background: white;\n  color: #1f2937;\n  max-height: 400px;\n  overflow-y: auto;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n/* Code formatting in output */\n.ontonaut-stream-output .code-block {\n  background: #f6f8fa;\n  border: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  border-radius: 6px;\n  padding: 12px;\n  margin: 8px 0;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  line-height: 1.5;\n  overflow-x: auto;\n  position: relative;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output .code-block {\n  background: #161616;\n  border-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-output .code-block::before {\n  content: attr(data-lang);\n  position: absolute;\n  top: 6px;\n  right: 10px;\n  font-size: 10px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.5px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-output .code-block code {\n  background: transparent;\n  padding: 0;\n  border: none;\n  font-size: inherit;\n  color: #1f2937;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output .code-block code {\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-output .inline-code {\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n  border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;\n  border-radius: 3px;\n  padding: 2px 6px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  color: #dc2626;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-output .inline-code {\n  background: #2a2a2a;\n  border-color: #404040;\n  color: #f87171;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-error {\n  margin: 0;\n  padding: 10px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  line-height: 18px;\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n  background: white;\n  color: #1f2937;\n  max-height: 400px;\n  overflow-y: auto;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-error {\n  color: #dc2626;\n  background: #fef2f2;\n  border-left: 2px solid #dc2626;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-stream-error {\n  color: #f87171;\n  background: #2a1a1a;\n  border-left-color: #f87171;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-stream-error:empty {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n/* Responsive */\n@media (max-width: 768px) {\n  .ontonaut-stream-toolbar {\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n  }\n  \n  .ontonaut-stream-input {\n    font-size: 12px;\n  }\n}\n"' data-buffer-paths='[]'></marimo-anywidget></marimo-ui-element>
